<template>
  <modal-component
    :show="isShowen"
    @create="addRow"
    v-model:show="isShowen"
  />
  <custom-button @click="showModal">Add Row</custom-button>
  <table-component/> 
</template>

<script>
  // import axios from 'axios';
  import TableComponent from './components/TableComponent.vue';
  import ModalComponent from './components/UI/ModalComponent.vue';

  export default {
    name: 'App',
    components: {
      TableComponent, ModalComponent
    },
    data() {
      return {
        isShowen: false
      }
    },
    methods: {
      addRow: async (tit, quant, dist) => {
        // const row = {tit, quant, dist}
        // const $host = axios.create({
        //     baseURL: process.env.VUE_APP_API_URL
        // })
        // const data = await $host.post('api/table', row)
        console.log({tit, quant, dist})
        // return data
      },
      showModal() {
        this.isShowen = true
      }
  }
}
</script>

<style>
  @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins&display=swap');

  * {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    font-size: 14px;
    font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
  }

  body {
    padding: 5% 10%;
    background: #f5f5f5;
  }
</style>
